review: I got this for Christmas, and I've got to say, best gift ever. Although it may not seem like a big deal, copying movies onto a usb drive takes forever, and with this, all I have to do is stream it directly from my computer to the Chromecast. Don't waste your money on Apple TV or Amazon Fire, get Chromecast. It's cheaper than it's competitors and has a lot more convenient features.
